price: ហើយពួកគេថែមទាំងបានបដិសេធ និងធ្វើតាមចំណង់របស់ ពួកគេទៀតផង។ ហើយរាល់កិច្ចការទាំងអស់គឺមានការកំណត់។
arabic: وَكَذَّبُواْ وَٱتَّبَعُوٓاْ أَهۡوَآءَهُمۡۚ وَكُلُّ أَمۡرٖ مُّسۡتَقِرّٞ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wakadhabū wa-ittabaʿū ahwāahum wakullu amrin mus'taqirrun
